text: sum tame kaho cho ke ibrahima (a.Sa.) Ane isma'ila (a.Sa.) Ane is'haka (a.Sa.) Ane yakuba (a.Sa.) Ane te'ona santana yahudi athava isa'i hata? Kahi do sum tame vadhu jano cho athava allaha ta'ala? Allaha pase saksi chupavanara thi vadhu atyacari kona ho'i sake? Ane allaha tamara karyothi ajana nathi
